entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 6:06 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.5°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Periods of snow early this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
